com.automatak.dnp3

Class LinkLayerConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.automatak.dnp3.LinkLayerConfig

  • public class LinkLayerConfig
extends Object
    Configuration class for the link layer

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean isMaster
      Controls the master/slave bit set on all messages
      int localAddr
      dnp3 address of the local device as a 16-bit unsigned integer
      int numRetry
      The number of retry attempts the link will attempt after the initial try if using confirms defaults to 0
      int remoteAddr
      dnp3 address of the remote device as a 16-bit unsigned integer
      long timeoutMs
      the response timeout in milliseconds for confirmed requests
      boolean useConfirms
      If true, the link layer will send data requesting confirmation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LinkLayerConfig(boolean isMaster)
      Constructor that sets reasonable defaults.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • isMaster

        public boolean isMaster
        Controls the master/slave bit set on all messages

      • useConfirms

        public boolean useConfirms
        If true, the link layer will send data requesting confirmation. This is generally NEVER set for a TCP connection and only sometimes set for serial. defaults to false

      • numRetry

        public int numRetry
        The number of retry attempts the link will attempt after the initial try if using confirms defaults to 0

      • localAddr

        public int localAddr
        dnp3 address of the local device as a 16-bit unsigned integer

      • remoteAddr

        public int remoteAddr
        dnp3 address of the remote device as a 16-bit unsigned integer

      • timeoutMs

        public long timeoutMs
        the response timeout in milliseconds for confirmed requests

    • Constructor Detail

      • LinkLayerConfig

        public LinkLayerConfig(boolean isMaster)
        Constructor that sets reasonable defaults. Override after construction
        Parameters:
        isMaster - True if the link layer is for a master, false for an outstation
